body_html:
Thank you for taking the time to cut through the red tape!

I've confirmed wobushiliu2@gmail.com is on record with signcla/ and that it is the email used when I git log on the CLI.

The problem now is likely that this email isn't associated with your GitHub account, so the bot has no way of knowing you are you.

I'd recommend going into your settings and make it look something like this:
body_text:
Thank you for taking the time to cut through the red tape!
I've confirmed wobushiliu2@gmail.com is on record with signcla/ and that it is the email used when I git log on the CLI.
The problem now is likely that this email isn't associated with your GitHub account, so the bot has no way of knowing you are you.

I'd recommend going into your settings and make it look something like this:
body:
Thank you for taking the time to cut through the red tape!

I've confirmed `wobushiliu2@gmail.com` is on record with signcla/ and that it is the email used when I `git log` on the CLI.

The problem now is likely that this email isn't associated with your GitHub account, so the bot has no way of knowing you are you.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49262/33112238-12655c26-cf07-11e7-88be-4fb1ccd13d82.png)

I'd recommend going into your settings and make it look something like this:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/49262/33112419-f7b8fbe8-cf07-11e7-8627-010cbf7533db.png)
